thread.title: They’re Safe in America. Now What? - The New York Times
thread.title_full: They’re Safe in America. Now What? - The New York Times

author: Jake Halpern
title: They’re Safe in America. Now What? - The New York Times
text:
They’re Safe in America. Now What? By JAKE HALPERN and MICHAEL SLOAN FEB. 18, 2017 The true story of a Syrian family’s journey to America. We plan to follow their lives over the coming months. 
“ Welcome to the New World ” is a series that will follow this family’s first months in America and appear regularly in Sunday Review. Read the other installments here. 
Jake Halpern is the author, most recently, of “Bad Paper: Inside the Secret World of Debt Collectors.” Michael Sloan is an illustrator and artist. “Welcome to the New World” will follow this family’s first months in America and appear regularly in Sunday Review. Designed by Grant Gold.
